page.title: 08Notable Events in Penryn
page.content: Each year{Penryn}has a local fairday when the main street is closed to all vehiculas traffic and stalls are put up to sell a variety of goods.Many inhabitants dress up in fashions of a hundred years ago.The school{Brass {Band}and the{Penryn Orchestra}play through out the day. There is also a {Carnival week}during the month of {August.}There are various activities during the week and the{Carnival}ends with a parade of floats through the town-lead by the Beauty Queen and her attendants.
